snippet: A study that examined domesticated trees and plants, including in areas near archaeological sites, supports the idea that indigenous humans helped shape the forest....

headline.main: How the Amazon’s Cashews and Cacao Point to Cultivation by the Ancients
headline.print_headline: How the Amazon’s Cashews and Cacao Point to Cultivation by the Ancients

lead_paragraph: A study that examined domesticated trees and plants, including in areas near archaeological sites, supports the idea that indigenous humans helped shape the forest.
